Content.Text:
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What is it, <MYNAME>?
Oh, you won huh?
<PAGE>
You didn't have to come tell me.
I was in the audience, so I know. 
<PAGE>
...And? What do you
want me to say,
"congratulations"?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow.
You're not bad at all. 
<PAGE>
...What's with that silly grin? 
You're like a dog.
Does winning make you that happy?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You won in the advanced class, huh?
I like people who work hard.
I think it's great, to be honest.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Congrats on winning, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
As a reward,
I'll let you ask me out
on a date sometime.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Well, that wouldn't need to be a reward.
If you beg me enough,
I probably won't say no, princess.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well done, <MYNAME>.
I knew you could do it, <MYNAME>.
...Huh? You want to know how I knew?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>It's because you're my dear princess.
My princess couldn't possibly lose.
Don't ask such obvious questions.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Hey. Stop grinning so
happily just because you won.
Other guys are watching you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>Jealous? Somebody like me? 
Don't be silly.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>You are my girlfriend, 
so be quiet and do as I say.
Got it? What do you have to say?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>...yeah, good girl. 
I should be the only one
you smile at that way.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I knew you'd win the
beginner class easily, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
You should try
a more challenging class.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>You're so modest, my princess.
That's what I like
about you, though.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Congratulations on your victory.
I was watching you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Huh? You were so bothered by my staring
that you couldn't focus on the
festival?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>What are you talking about?
I watch you every day. I was doing
it even before we got married.
<PAGE>
Sheesh...You're as naive
as ever, even now we're married.
That's what I like about you, though.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's just like you to win in
the advanced class, princess.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>As a reward,
I'll attend to you once in a while.
What would you like me to do for you?
<PAGE>
Shall I make you dinner?
Or help you with work?
I'll do whatever you want.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
You lost? Hmm.
And? What do you want me 
to say, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
I'm not going to comfort you or
anything silly like that. If you want
to be consoled, go somewhere else.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's nothing wrong with
losing once in a while, is there?
<PAGE>
It's boring if you
win all the time.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Don't look so depressed
just because you lost.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Don't blame me for whatever happens
when you show up looking like that.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well done, <MYNAME>.
You're pretty cute when
you're broken-hearted, you know.
<PAGE>
But if I had to pick,
I'd say I prefer it when
you smile, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
So be sure to win next time
and give me a brilliant smile!
That's an order.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's too bad you didn't win,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I'll do something special for you
today. Shall I comfort you tenderly?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Why do you look so sad?
Does losing hurt
that much?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>You shouldn't get all depressed
just because you lost.
Besides...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>When you look like that, 
it makes me want to tease you.
Huh? I'm mean? You only just noticed?
<PAGE>
...If you don't like it,
you need to smile brightly
like you always do.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You'd better not have lost
just so I'd cheer you up.
You're such a naughty princess.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Huh, that's not it?
Yes, it is.
Let's say that's what it is.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Were you sick or something today?
With your skill I thought
you could have won...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>I'm not blaming you or anything.
I'm not so mean that I'd tease
my princess after she worked so hard.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm not going to abandon you
just because you didn't win,
so don't worry.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Am I disappointed?  Of course not.
You're still my beloved princess,
same as ever.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, you can cook surprisingly
well!
<PAGE>
... What's wrong? Don't get angry.
I'm just saying it like it is.
<PAGE>
... What? Are you saying I look 
like I can't cook? That's going
a little far, don't you think?
<PAGE>
Well, first impressions
might change.
<PAGE>
In fact, the impression you had of me
has changed. Isn't that good?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you keep eating oily food every day, 
soon your hair will 
get oily, too.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>Even without oily food every day, 
hair starts to get greasy, 
like it's smeared with wax.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>If you don't want to end up like that, 
you should knock off the oily foods, 
right?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, congrats
on winning in the beginner class!
<PAGE>
You're very talented, so
you should try the
harder classes too, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I'll be rooting for you!
Good luck!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congrats on winning in the intermediate
class! You really are amazing,
<MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
I should follow
your example!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's just like you to win in the
advanced class! You're amazing!
<PAGE>
Now you've come this far, you ought
to aim for back-to-back victories! Work
hard so you can win again next time!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, congrats
on winning in the beginner class!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>My beloved girlfriend just won.
I'm as happy as if
 I'd won myself!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>! Congrats 
on winning in the intermediate class!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Seeing you work so hard 
makes me feel like I should
try harder too, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
As your boyfriend, I've got to
become a guy who's worthy
of you, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Congrats on winning in the advanced
class! ...Huh? I'm acting
funny, you say?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>Um... Well. 
I really am happy that
you won, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>But... That is...
I don't want you
to get too popular, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>I mean, then it'll be
like you belong to everyone.
You're MY girlfriend, <MYNAME>...

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations on winning, <MYNAME>!
Let celebrate together when we get home.
<PAGE>
What would you like for dinner?
I'll cook whatever you want,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Don't be shy!
You should at least take
it easy on days like this.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations, <MYNAME>!
I was sure
you'd win!
<PAGE>
After all, you work so
hard day after day, <MYNAME>. I've been
watching you from close up, so I know.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>But I was a little worried
that you might be working too hard.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>We're a couple, you know.  
You should depend on me a little more.
Let's work hard together!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey, <MYNAME>,
congratulations on winning!
<PAGE>
Is it really okay for me to have
such a wonderful person as my wife?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>I'm the happiest man 
in the world with you
for a wife, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's just too bad.
But you did your best, <MYNAME>.
I hope you can win next time!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well done.
It's too bad you didn't win...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>But I think 
just entering was
good enough.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
It was the advanced class, after all.
It was bound to be vs. strong opponents.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>I'm sure you'll
win next time, <MYNAME>!
Give it your best shot!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Well done, <MYNAME>.
You didn't win today, but
I'm sure you'll be fine next time!
<PAGE>
So don't look
so sad, okay?
<PAGE>
When you look sad, it makes
me sad too, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
It's too bad about today.
I really thought you were
going to win.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>... Hmm, I wonder what
went wrong?
<PAGE>
Oh, I know!
We should go ask Clement
more about it later on.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You did well, <MYNAME>.
It's too bad you didn't win...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>Um... Well, uh...
I'm sorry, I can't think of any
clever lines to cheer you up with. 
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>I wish 
I could make you smile at times
like these, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Sorry I'm such a useless boyfriend. 
I'll do my best until next time.
It'll be like my homework.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Well done.
I'm sorry about today.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Oh, I've got an idea! 
How about I make dinner
tonight to cheer you up?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well done, <MYNAME>.
You must be tired, right?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Let's have a relaxing cup
of tea together when we get home.
<PAGE>
Then the two of us can figure out how
you can win next time!
As your husband I want to help you.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's too bad you didn't win.
But I'm sure you were just a
little off your game today.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I know best how hard
you always work, <MYNAME>.
Let's go home and get some rest.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Oh! While we're at it, why
don't we hold hands on the way home?
...Huh? Don't be embarrassed.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm really hungry after the
Cooking Festival today, with
so many delicious looking dishes.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>We should have
dinner early tonight!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>But if we eat 
too early, we'll get hungry 
again before bedtime.. hmm, what to do..

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Everything looked so delicious!  
I was drooling just 
looking at the dishes.
<PAGE>
I know it's because he's a judge, 
but I'm still jealous that 
Clement gets to try everything.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congrats on winning, <MYNAME>. Are you
going to try intermediate class or
higher next?
<PAGE>
It doesn't matter whether you
win or not. You should try lots
of different things while you're young!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I knew you could do it, <MYNAME>.
congratulations on winning!
<PAGE>
This old fellow had a great
time watching you. I'll be
expecting great things next time.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yo, <MYNAME>.
Great job winning in the
advanced class.
<PAGE>
No one's a match for you now, huh?
I envy you young people.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations on your victory,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Is it just me, or did that 
look like a piece of cake?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Well, it's probably because 
I'm your boyfriend, <MYNAME>. I can tell 
just from watching.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Congratulations, <MYNAME>.
It's great that you won.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I'm so happy you'd think 
I'm the one who won.
Congratulations, I really mean it.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yo, <MYNAME>.
Congratulations on winning.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I always have fun at 
festivals when you take part, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Hmm?  What do I mean by that?
I don't mean it in a bad way.
It's a compliment.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>You look so sweet 
when you're working hard that I never 
tire of watching you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations on your victory, <MYNAME>.
I expected just as much, though.
<PAGE>
If I wasn't on a break,
I would have loved to
write an article about you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Of course, if I did write one, it would
be full of my opinions as your husband,
so it's just as well that I can't.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Congrats on winning, <MYNAME>.
You're amazing, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Cove over here.
I'll caress you as
much as you want!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Winning in the advanced class is
a pretty big deal.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
No one would believe someone
like you could be my wife, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I'm starting to think I should
get more serious as well. "More
serious about what?" That's a secret!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Too bad about today.
But there's always next time.
It's only truly over when you give up.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm sure you got plenty out of this
even though you didn't win.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>...Just kidding.
This old boy just wanted to spout
a few serious lines for the fun of it.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You did well, <MYNAME>. 
All the participants in the 
advanced class were tough.
<PAGE>
Some of them were famous guys
I'd seen in a magazine before.
I was quite surprised!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
There, there.
...Wait, huh? You don't
seem very sad, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>And here I thought I was being all 
considerate for once.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I'm your boyfriend, 
after all, <MYNAME>.
It's my job to comfort you.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You didn't win today, but
there's always next time.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Come to think of it...
I should find a book with tips on
winning for you before next time. 
<PAGE>
I've got to
try to help you
however I can, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good job, <MYNAME>.
You gave it your all out there.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>You may have lost today, but I'm
sure you'll win next time, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>I mean, come on. Anyone
capable of winning in the advanced
class has got to be seriously good. 
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>So don't feel so bad
that you lost this time!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's just one of
those things.
There's no point moping about it. 
<PAGE>
Want to stop by somewhere before
we go home for a change of pace?
I'll keep you company.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yeah.
You did your best, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Don't worry,
I know you did. You were
just a little off your game today.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Let's head back.
I'm sure you'll forget all the
bad stuff once you're relaxing at home.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Oh, hey... 
You're upset.
<PAGE>
Don't cry just because
you didn't win.
<PAGE>
Seeing you cry makes
me want to cry, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Uh... there, there. When we get home
I'll pamper you as much as you like.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Cooking is like a mirror:
You can observe in your food the
character of the person who prepared it.
<PAGE>
I think your cooking really
showed off your characteristics,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Hmm? What characteristics, you
ask?
<PAGE>
Hmm, that's difficult to put into
words... Anyway, it's a good
thing!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
At this age, I can't very well eat 
a lot of strongly flavored foods.
<PAGE>
When I was young, though, 
I thought that oily, 
salty food was the best.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>This current diet is probably better
for my health, come to think of it.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My sincere congrats on your victory.
The beginner class might be a little
too easy for you though, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Have you considered taking part
at the intermediate level next time?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
My sincere congrats on your victory.
I know why Amir considers you a friend.
<PAGE>
I am certain Amir is
overjoyed to hear that
you have won, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>,
Allow me to offer my congratulations. 
That was a superb showing.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations on your victory,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Watching you out there
truly encouraged me, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
You must have some
mysterious power to encourage
people, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My sincere congrats on your victory.
I watched you from
beginning to end, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>To celebrate, 
I'll make you some
tea, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>No one other than Amir
has ever made me feel like 
making them tea.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>,
Allow me to offer my congratulations. 
<PAGE>
<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Amir was so delighted by
your victory one would think
he had won himself.
<PAGE>
I am not one to show emotions,
so it is almost as if Prince Amir
was your boyfriend, not me...
<PAGE>
<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>Pardon? Oh, no.
I am just a little uncomfortable...
I wonder why.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT>
My sincere congrats on your victory.
However, I do think you have what
it takes to aim even higher.
<PAGE>
I have been at your side watching you.
There can be no doubt about it.
<PAGE>
Would you participate in the
intermediate class or higher next time?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>,
Allow me to offer my congrats. This
is the result of your daily dedication. 
<PAGE>
<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>However I am
a little concerned that you
might be working too hard, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Given your personality, however, it
might be hard for you to take things
even if I asked you to, but...
<PAGE>
<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Please got some rest, at
least for today. When we get back I
will  make you some delicious tea.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My sincere congratulations on your
victory in the advanced class.
You are truly impressive, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I am a happy man
to be married to someone like you.
<PAGE>
I will continue to work hard to
be a man who is worthy of
you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>Please stay by 
my side from now on.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>,
You did well.
<PAGE>
Do not be disheartened.
Please rest today and prepare
for next time.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well done,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Although you did not get the result
you had hoped for, Amir and I
and everyone else in the
<PAGE>
town know how hard
you tried.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It is unfortunate that
you were not victorious.
<PAGE>
However the effort you
put in today was
surely not in vain. 
<PAGE>
There is nothing better than hard work. 
If you do not give up, I am confident
that you will do better next time.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>,
You did well.
<PAGE>
This is not my biased opinion as your
lover. I honestly believe the contest
was very close, but...
<PAGE>
An expert judge's opinion is
a very complicated thing.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I was
so upset by
the result that
<PAGE>
Amir had
to console me.
<PAGE>
That just will not do.
Not when I am supposed to be
comforting you instead, <MYNAME>,

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ah, <MYNAME>.
Today's result was highly unfortunate.
<PAGE>
I wish I could do
something to take away
your sadness, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I don't know what I should say
as your boyfriend at times like this.
I apologize for being of so little use.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>,
You did well.
You must be tired.
<PAGE>
Please leave all the housework
to me and rest today
without a care. 
<PAGE>
<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>You can go back to working hard
tomorrow.  I will do anything
I can to support you.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's unfortunate about today's
results, but you worked hard, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
In fact, maybe you worked
a little too hard all by yourself.
Please allow me to assist you next time.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>If we work hard as a couple, I am
sure we will win.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, <MYNAME>.
You did well today.
<PAGE>
It's unfortunate that you did not win.
However these things do happen.
Please do not lose courage.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>When we get home,
I'll make you a relaxing tea with
these herbs I just picked.
<PAGE>
Leave all the chores
to me and relax
with a cup of tea.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Amir didn't used to be able to eat
green peppers.
<PAGE>
Whenever he was served a dish with
green peppers in it, he would stealthily
push them to the edge.
<PAGE>
I scolded him repeatedly, but he just
didn't seem to be able to eat them.
<PAGE>
I tried chopping them finely and mixing
them into curry. He was able to eat it!
What a moving experience that was.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
At the very least, manners are 
also an important element in the
